about.subtitle: Nasza platforma to nowoczesny portal ogłoszeniowy dedykowany branży budowlanej. Łączymy wykonawców, firmy i klientów indywidualnych, ułatwiając znalezienie specjalistów oraz usług w zakresie budowy, remontów i prac wykończeniowych. Dzięki intuicyjnej wyszukiwarce, przejrzystym kategoriom i szczegółowym profilom ogłoszeń, znalezienie odpowiedniego fachowca jest szybkie i bezproblemowe.

statute.label: I accept the terms of service of buildhub.com
statute.header: Terms of Use for the buildhub.com application
statute.subheader: Welcome to the buildhub.com application (hereinafter referred to as the “Application”). Before creating an account, please read the following terms of use.

introduction.label: Introduction
introduction.value: These Terms of Service define the rules for using the buildhub.com application, which allows for the creating and managing of advertisements. By registering in the Application, the user accepts the terms outlined below.

account_registration.label: Account Registration
account_registration.value: To create an account in the Application, the user must provide their email address and password. The user agrees to provide true and accurate information and not to share their login credentials with third parties. During registration, the user will receive a confirmation email to activate the account.

processing_data.label: Collection and Processing of Personal Data
processing_data.value: The Application collects the following personal data: Email address - to enable registration, login and communication with the user. Password - to ensure the security of the user's account. Personal data is processed to provide the services of the Application, including registration, login, and user communication. Users have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of their data. Data is stored in the Application's database and may also be stored in cookies to manage user preferences, such as language and theme (light/dark). Users can delete these data at any time via their browser settings.

google_analytics.label: Google Analytics and Other Analytical Tools
google_analytics.value: The Application uses analytical tools such as Google Analytics to track user activity on the website, including visit counts and time spent on specific pages. Information collected by Google Analytics may include IP address, device type, browser, geographic data, time spent on the site, and interactions with content. By using the Application, the user consents to the collection and processing of this data for analysis and improvement purposes. Users may opt out of Google Analytics by blocking the relevant cookies in their browser settings.

cookies.label: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.value: The Application uses cookies and local storage to store user preferences such as language selection and theme (light/dark). This data is stored on the user's device to provide a smooth and personalized experience. Users have the right to manage their cookie settings in their browser. Blocking cookies may affect the functionality of some parts of the Application.

security.label: Security
security.value: User data is stored securely using appropriate technical safeguards. User passwords are stored in encrypted form to ensure their protection. Nevertheless, users should be aware that no method of data storage is completely immune to unauthorized access.

terms_changes.label: Changes to the Terms
terms_changes.value: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be published on this page, and users will be notified via the Application. Accepting the updated terms will require users to re-confirm their acceptance of the Terms of Service.

contact.label: Contact
contact.value: If you have any questions regarding these Terms or the Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@buildhub.com
